subject: Issue with simsonn pro x ultra
description_text:
Hello. I'm trying to set the input control value, but an unknown axis 4 from the pedals always interrupts the installation of other axes. The other 3 axes for the clutch, brake and gas work correctly, but the 4th axis appears. Simsonn Pro x ultra
--
Ай-Бэлэк Донгак
Отправлено из Почты  Mail

conversations.body_text: Hi суй Донгак,    You can try fixing this issue using SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1:  Open the SIMSONN Manager 2.1.1 software.  In the interface, click the “Restore” button.  Then click the “Save” button.  Reinsert the USB cable.  Finally, test to confirm if the RX axis has been successfully disabled.  https://drive.google.com/file/d/1mS9dS2GyzhRYo81BcmTIOXY1POa6RvST/view?usp=drive_link
